description: Seriously versatile, this is your midlayer for cold ski tours and climbs, your standalone for mornings at camp and fall hikes. Made from Polartec® Power Stretch® Pro - a fabric combining a highly durable nylon face with a soft, comfortable interior - it delivers warmth, moisture management, and breathable comfort. A deep front zip makes it easy to take on and off, four-way stretch and articulated patterning provide superior freedom of movement, and two front pockets warm your hands.
name: Arcteryx Kyanite AR Half Zip - Mens
